captions.text: "Yuan Yuan's" beloved bed is back!!
There was a bed there before
"Yuan Yuan" is especially fond and depends on it
After "Yuan Zai" was born
To prevent the cub from falling into the slits in the frame,
the bed was temporarily removed
Since "Yuan Zai" has grown older,
the zookeeper put mom's bed back into the room
When "Yuan Yuan" went back into her room,
she immediately noticed the bed
After inspecting the bed,
"Yuan Yuan" quickly climbed up on the bed
Now the biggest difference is
there's another one to share the bed
"Yuan Zai" is full of curiosity with this new friend
*sniff here*
*sniff there*
The zookeeper is at the bedside adding a "staircase"
to help "Yuan Zai" get on and off the bed
This small cub is quick to learn how to use the staircase
playing with it, going up and down, up and down
Looks like "Yuan Zai" found a secret military base underneath the bed.
starting to explore here and there inside
What a fun, enjoyable adventure moving about
Before, the bed had multiple uses for mama
Besides sleeping
"Yuan Yuan" will set a spot around the bed to relieve herself
There are even more functions for the bed now
"Yuan Yuan" will also breastfeed there
And also play mother-daughter games
on the bed, but it's an important place for interaction
"Yuan Yuan" really likes this new bed
"Yuan Zai" also likes playing on top
As a result, the zookeeper has to spend more time every morning
to wake up the pair to go outside to move about
so they can clean the room

title: 圓圓的床回來了 Giant Panda Yuan Yuan And Yuan Zai's New Bed
